description: Generate user stories from simple ideas

parentId.description: Optional parent story ID for child stories

example.idea: I want to add a search feature

success.description: Whether the story was successfully posted to frontend

prompt.template:
Create a user story for: {{idea}}

{{parentContext}}TASK: Generate story data and return it as JSON.

1. Generate story fields:
   - storyId: story-[timestamp]
   - title: [concise title]
   - description: As a [role], I want [goal] so that [benefit]
   - asA, iWant, soThat: [extract from description]
   - components: [relevant components]
   - storyPoint: [1-13 based on complexity]

2. Also post to backend:
curl -X POST {{frontendUrl}}/api/story-created -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '[JSON with generated data]'

3. Return the story data as JSON:
{"storyId":"[generated-id]","title":"[title]","description":"[description]","asA":"[role]","iWant":"[goal]","soThat":"[benefit]","components":["[components]"],"storyPoint":[points],"enhanced":true,"enhancedAt":"[timestamp]","source":"kiro-direct"}
instructions: Post to backend AND return the same data
Return the actual story JSON, not a confirmation message
Use realistic values for all fields
Execute curl command and return story data
Frontend will receive the story data immediately
